sentence: The former president also went after U.S. Rep. Peter Meijer, R-Grand Rapids, who voted to impeach Trump for instigating the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the U.S. Capitol.
author: Dave Boucher
title: Trump hammers at false claims of voter fraud in return to Michigan

sentence: Friday, Apr 22, 2022 11:30:12 AM Pacific Daylight Time Jeff Singer MI-03: Rep. Peter Meijer, who was one of the 10 House Republicans to vote to impeach Trump, faces primary opposition from conservative commentator John Gibbs, who is Trump's endorsed candidate.
title: Daily Kos Elections Live Digest: 4/22
